partial_progress.details: Root cause identified: canonical_task_rel definition too weak for cross-sign compositionality. Solution: strengthen definition to unconditionally require both GContent and HContent conditions. Report written with full analysis, counter-model, proof sketch, and implementation recommendations.

findings_summary.root_cause: canonical_task_rel conditions are sign-conditioned, making cross-sign cases vacuously weak
findings_summary.solution: Remove sign-conditioning: require GContent(M) subset N AND HContent(N) subset M unconditionally
findings_summary.sorry_remediation: All 4 eliminated by strengthened definition + temp_4/temp_4_past transitivity
findings_summary.key_insight: With unconditional both-direction conditions, compositionality reduces to standard CanonicalR transitivity (already proven) and its past analog
